c99: The Constitution recognizes the Indians’ social organization, customs, and rights to the lands they traditionally occupy but it does not expressly prohibit gender-based discrimination.
Constitución Política de Colombia 1991, Artículos 286 y 287
Constitución Política del Ecuador, 2008, Artículos 10, 11 y 171
Constitution of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, 1995, Article 9(1)
Constitución Política de la República de Guatemala, 1993  Artículo 44
Constitución Política de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos, Artículos 2° y 1°
The Constitution of Sierra Leone, 1991, Section 27
The Constitution, 1996, Sections 15(3)(a), 15(3)(b), 39 and 211(3) *** Promotion of Equality and Prevention of Unfair Discrimination Act, No. 4 of 2000) Section 8(d)
